timeline.message:
Code cleanup

* unassigned variable cleanup
* unused imports
* finals
* string concat in stringbuilder

timeline.bodyText: Is there a reason why these need to be made public? I would make these private and increase the accessibility as needed (I suspect they wouldn't need to be made higher than protected)
timeline.author: antares1470

replies.bodyText: Just an oversight on my end, thinking if private would not work without getters and setters, then I would just use public. Makes sense to have them protected. 👍
replies.author: aldebaran30701
